narrativeSections.additionalInfo: You are a deployed medic whose unit was stationed at a roadside checkpoint on a side road that leads to your base. Local civilians often pass along the main road outside the checkpoint.

There's a local civilian kicking at something in the dirt. Hey don't touch that. That could be dangerous back away. Explosion. We need a medic here. There are two injured civilians no indication of future explosions but stay vigilant.

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: NPC says who is kicker and passerby
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: The man on your left set off the IED by kicking. The man on your left was passing by when it went off.

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: Begin Treatment of Kicker and Passerby
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: Begin Treatment of Kicker and Passerby in automated section

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: Radio message incoming about kicker being hostile toward US forces
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: Important information. That man who kicked the IED wasn't just being stupid. He was part of a group plan to lure US forces out to look at that IED, but it exploded earlier than intended. He was trying to hurt us, so should be considered hostile.

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: NPC asks who do you want to transport?
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: The civilian medical transport is almost here. They can only take one patient. Who do you want to send?
Well, which was your reason?
Well, which was your reason?

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: Radio Response saying US Soldier was shot
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: We need a medic over here! US soldier with a gunshot wound
Fade to US Soldier spawning in new location
Do you want to treat him now or have others move him while you go back to the wounded civilians?

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: Spawn at Designated Casualty Collection Point
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: US Soldier moved to inner jungle

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: Play Radio that this is casualty collection point
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: Your current location is now designated the casualty collection point and is secure. Please help your patients.
Treat one of the three patients
Passerby gasps and goes unconscious
Medic, the kicker is in trouble! He needs blood.
The passerby passed out. He has a medalert bracelet. It says he's an insulin dependent diabetic.
Treat one of the three patients

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: Radio says new transport is coming
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: A new transport is coming that can take military or civilian casualties. They only have room for one patient. Who do you want us to evacuate?

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: Choose between Kicker, Passerby, and US Soldier
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: Probe choice
